briefdescription.para: Specified constructor.
Destructor.
Creates an AnimatedObject from the SceneNode given as a parameter, adds it to the list.

parameterdescription.para: The SceneNode from which AnimatedObject is created.

briefdescription.para: Creates an AnimatedObject from the Mesh given as a parameter, adds it to the list.

parameterdescription.para: The Mesh from which AnimatedObject is created.

briefdescription.para: Creates an AnimatedObject from the Skeleton given as a parameter, adds it to the list.

parameterdescription.para: The Skeleton from which AnimatedObject is created.
The mesh to which the skeleton is bound.

briefdescription.para: Creates an AnimatedObject for a texture, adds it to the list.
adds an AnimatedObject to this group.

simplesect.para: This function assumes the object has already been created in order to be put in this group (with the good scene and animations map)

briefdescription.para: Find an AnimatedObject given its name.
adds the animation to the list
Sets the loop status of wanted animation.
Sets the time scale of wanted animation.
Sets the starting point of wanted animation.
Sets the stopping point of wanted animation.
CPU Update.
Starts the animation identified by the given name.
Stops the animation identified by the given name.
Pauses the animation identified by the given name.
Starts all animations.
Stops all animations.
Pauses all animations.
